column4: I want a browser that takes lesser ram and processing thn firefox n chrome.
it all comes down to what you browse pretty much regardless of the browser; the internet is getting more complicated
I don't mind if it loads pages a bit slower, i don't want it to affect other apps am running with it.

then you need to use something like links that doesn't even load images or anything but text; but seriously once you start doing anything else you're pretty much loading what you browse regardless of what's doing it
